schema.title: App name
schema.description: App name used to generate Android Studio files and class names. CamelCase e.g. 'MyAndroidApp'

schema.title: App ID
schema.description: App id used as package for the new app. FQDN e.g. 'com.example.app'

validators.message: App ID must be a fully qualified domain name

schema.title: owner
schema.description: The owner name used to identify the owner of this component

validators.message: Owner names must consist only of lowercase letters
